message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $120. This is a great opportunity to experience the quality and benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its market value of $150. We're confident you'll find it worth every penny. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.
